exceptions.exn: In environment T : System extendsNN : Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) H : wConsistent T Unable to unify "~ SysPrf T (notH G)" with "exists f : Formula, ~ SysPrf T f /\\ ~ SysPrf T (notH f) /\\ (forall v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
extendsNN: Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T
repT: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarRepT: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN repT) -> v = v0
expressT1: forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))
expressT2: forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))

Goal:
wConsistent T -> exists f : Formula, ~ SysPrf T f /\ ~ SysPrf T (notH f) /\ (forall v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))

Premises:
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (
codeFormula = code.codeFormula LNN codeLNTFunction codeLNNRelation : fol.Formula LNN -> nat
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
notH = fol.notH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
wConsistent = fun T : System => forall (f : Formula) (v : nat), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarFormula LNN f) -> v = x) -> SysPrf T (existH v (notH f)) -> exists n : nat, ~ SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v (natToTerm n)) : System -> Prop
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : System extendsNN : Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]

nil : list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsNN : Included (fol.Formula LNN) NN T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNN repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]

codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect2 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> forall p : Prf L A f, SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p))))

FirstIncompletenessB = fun H : wConsistent T => let con : (forall f : Formula, SysPrf T f) ->...-> ~ SysPrf T (notH G)
codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))

PRrepresentable.minimize1 : forall (A B : Formula) (v x : nat), v <> x -> ~ In x (freeVarFormula LNN B) -> forall a : nat, SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm a)) -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm a)) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN A v (natToTerm b)))) -> (forall b : nat, b < a -> SysPrf NN (notH (substituteFormula LNN B v (natToTerm b)))) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (andH A (forallH x (impH (LT (var x) (var v)) (notH (substituteFormula LNN B v (var x)))))) (equal (var v) (natToTerm a)))
codeSysPrfNCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm (codePrf L codeF codeR A (fol.notH L f) p)))
forallI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat), ~ In_freeVarSys LNN v T -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (forallH v f)
codeSysPrfNCorrect3 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall n : nat, codeArityF n <> 0 -> exists f : Functions L, codeF f = n) ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrfNot L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm n)))
Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> SysPrf T f

existI : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t) -> SysPrf T (existH v f)
forallE : forall (T : System) (f : Formula) (v : nat) (t : Term), SysPrf T (forallH v f) -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN f v t)
sysExtend : forall (T U : System) (f : Formula), Included (fol.Formula LNN) T U -> SysPrf T f -> SysPrf U f
orSys : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T f) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) h -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T (orH f g)) h

codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect3 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (natToTerm n)))
subFormulaNil : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)
sysWeaken : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f
closedNatToTerm : forall a v : nat, ~ In v (freeVarTerm LNN (natToTerm a))
LNN2LNT.LNN2LNT_freeVarFormula1 : forall (f : fol.Formula LNN) (v : nat), In v (freeVarFormula LNT (LNN2LNT.LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f)
impI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) T g) f -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
folReplace.reduceSub : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), ~ In_freeVarSys L v T -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s))

```coq
intros.
apply FirstIncompletenessB.
intro con.
intro f.
assert (g : Formula).
{
  apply existH with v0.
  apply notH.
  exact (con f).
}
assert (h : Formula).
{
  apply existH with v0.
  apply notH.
  exact (con g).
}
split; [apply expressT1 | apply expressT2].
Qed.```

original: intros. apply FirstIncompletenessB. intro con. intro f. assert (g : Formula). { apply existH with v0. apply notH. apply (con f). } assert (h : Formula). { apply existH with v0. apply notH. apply (con g). } split; [apply expressT1 | apply expressT2].
